item.title: Export Data as CSV
item.description: In my research I found a hundred and more different ways to manage the task of exporting data into a CSV file. Whenever Iâ€™m learning something new, on a new system or with a new language, I like to build the process myself from scratch. And being a minimalist programmer it just seems fitting. Enjoy
